Question: This person was praised for his comedic timing, specializing in one-liners and rapid-fire delivery of jokes.
Hints: For a time this person attended the Boys Industrial School in Lancaster, Ohio.
The United States Air Force named a C-17 Globemaster III transport aircraft the Spirit of this person.
This person bought a share of the Los Angeles Rams football team in 1947 with Bing Crosby and sold it in 1962.
